subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Columbia University finished over .500 only twice since 1971, and its 5-5 record last year was widely regarded as a huge step forward. Coach Norries Wilson thinks the Lions are capable of improving.
snippet: Columbia University finished over .500 only twice since 1971, and its 5-5 record last year was widely regarded as a huge step forward. Coach Norries Wilson thinks the Lions are capable of improving.
